Post.title: Cloudreve
Post._content:
<!--markdown--># 0,Cloudreve

![Screenshot](https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/EastCloud/u1sy_blog_1@latest/usr/uploads/2021/06/3440101061.png)


**DEMO**[pan.u1sy.cn][2]

### 

*  OSS COSOneDrive () 
* / 
*  Aria2 
*  /
*  WebDAV 
* 
* 
* 
* 
* Office 
* PWA 
* All-In-One 
* ......

# 1
### :hammer_and_wrench: 

CPU

```shell
# 
tar -zxvf cloudreve_VERSION_OS_ARCH.tar.gz

# 
chmod +x ./cloudreve

#  Cloudreve
./cloudreve
```

 [ - ](https://docs.cloudreve.org/) 

# 2
### 2.1
```shell
vim ./conf.ini
```

```shell
[Database]
;  sqlite | mysql
Type = mysql
; MySQL 
Port = 3306
; 
User = root
; 
Password = [mysql_db_root_passwd]
; 
Host = localhost
; 
Name = cloudreve
; 
TablePrefix = cd
```
'[mysql_db_root_passwd]'mysqroot


```shell
[System]
Mode = master
Listen = :5200
Debug = false
SessionSecret = [SessionSecret]
HashIDSalt = [HashIDSalt]

[Database]
Type = mysql
Port = 3306
User = root
Password = [mysql_db_root_passwd]
Host = localhost
Name = cloudreve
TablePrefix = cd_
```
[SessionSecret][HashIDSalt]

'[mysql_db_root_passwd]'mysqroot

sqlitecloudreve.db
```shell
rm cloudreve.db
```
### 2.2
```shell
./cloudreve
```




### 2.3
```shell
./cloudreve -eject
```
statics/home/[username]/cloudreve/statics/nginxroot

# 3
### 3.1
vi
```shell
vi /usr/lib/systemd/system/cloudreve.service
```

```shell
[Unit]
Description=Cloudreve
Documentation=https://docs.cloudreve.org
After=network.target
Wants=network.target

[Service]
Type=simple
WorkingDirectory=/home/[username]/cloudreve
ExecStart=/home/[username]/cloudreve/cloudreve
Restart=on-abnormal
RestartSec=5s
KillMode=mixed

StandardOutput=null
StandardError=syslog

[Install]
WantedBy=multi-user.target
```
root'[username]'

### 3.2
```shell
# 
systemctl daemon-reload

# 
systemctl start cloudreve

# 
systemctl enable cloudreve
```
### 3.3
```shell
# 
systemctl start cloudreve

# 
systemctl stop cloudreve

# 
systemctl restart cloudreve

# 
systemctl status cloudreve
```
# 4

**DEMO**[pan.u1sy.cn][3]


  [1]: https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/EastCloud/u1sy_blog_1@latest/usr/uploads/2021/06/3440101061.png
  [2]: http://pan.u1sy.cn:5212
  [3]: http://pan.u1sy.cn:5212
